    • searchProduct

      DefaultTableModel searchProduct(String title, double rating, double calories, double protein, double fat, double sodium, double price)
      This method allows a Client to search a new base product in the list of products 
      "The precondition verifies that the title for the product has been provided"
Precondition: "base product is not null exists"
      Parameters:
      title - title of a menu item
      rating - rating of a menu item
      calories - calories of a menu item
      protein - protein of a menu item
      fat - fat of a menu item
      sodium - sodium of a menu item
      price - price of a menu item
      Returns:
      model for the updated table

    • createNewOrder

      Order createNewOrder(int clientId, int day, int month, int hour)
      This method allows the Client to prepare a new order 
      "The precondition verifies that the base product has been provided"
Precondition: "base product is not null exists"
      Parameters:
      clientId - client id of a new order
      day - day for the order
      month - month for the order
      hour - hour for the order
      Returns:
      a newly created order

    • generateReports

      void generateReports(int startHour, int endHour, int minNoOrderedProducts, int minNoOrdersFromAClient, int minPricePerOrder, int dayOfOrder)
      This method generates the reports for the admin based on the preiously placed orders
      Parameters:
      startHour - the starting hour used to find the orders placed in a certain interval
      endHour - the ending hour used to find the orders placed in a certain interval
      minNoOrderedProducts - the minimum number of orders for a certain product
      minNoOrdersFromAClient - the minimum number of orders from a certain client
      minPricePerOrder - the minimum price for orders
      dayOfOrder - the day for which the reports will be computed

    • generateBill

      void generateBill(HashMap<String,MenuItem> ordersList, Integer clientId)
